class.name: UtilityAIBTRandomSelector
class.brief_description: Executes its child nodes in a random order until one of them succeeds (returning 1) or all of them fail (returning -1).
class.description: This node type is used to create fallbacks. The [UtilityAIBTRandomSelector] node executes its child nodes in a random order until one of them succeeds (returning 1) or all of them fail (returning -1). If a child returns running (0) the selector will return running to its parent.
